text: Co-chef

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Ask your teen what kind of meal they would like to eat.
source_text: Ask your teen what kind of meal they would like to eat.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Prepare it together! The first time, you may need to guide them.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Once your teen knows how to prepare the meal, let them take the lead and follow their instructions.
source_text: Once your teen knows how to prepare the meal, let them take the lead and follow their instructions.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Let each child and teen in the house have a turn at being the head chef.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: What Are You Doing?
source_text: What Are You Doing?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: This game is best when more than 2 people play.
source_text: This game is best when more than 2 people play.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair.
source_text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: A second person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: A second person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”
source_text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The second person’s answer must always be something different from what they are actually doing!
source_text: The second person’s answer must always be something different from what they are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The next person should act out the second person’s answer and when someone asks what they are doing, their answer must be different from what they are actually doing!
source_text: The next person should act out the second person’s answer and when someone asks what they are doing, their answer must be different from what they are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the End of the Day
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.
source_text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: You are a star!
source_text: You are a star!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Superpowers
source_text: Superpowers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Think of a superpower. For example, going anywhere instantly, travelling in time, reading minds.
source_text: Think of a superpower. For example, going anywhere instantly, travelling in time, reading minds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Ask your teen “If you had the superpower to […] how would you use it?”
source_text: Ask your teen “If you had the superpower to […] how would you use it?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Encourage them to give themselves a superhero name and act like a superhero.
source_text: Encourage them to give themselves a superhero name and act like a superhero.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Now let them choose a super power for you.
source_text: Now let them choose a super power for you.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Make sure you act it out too!
source_text: Make sure you act it out too!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: See It Be It
source_text: See It Be It

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup.
source_text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it!”
source_text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it!”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.
source_text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?
source_text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.
source_text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!
source_text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!

source_text: Story time

source_text: Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”

source_text: Let your child make up the next sentence.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time

source_text: Make sure to end the story on a positive note.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time

source_text: Ask your child what was their favourite part of the story!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Worms Go Home
source_text: Worms Go Home

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Lie on your tummies and pretend your index fingers are a wiggly worm.
source_text: Lie on your tummies and pretend your index fingers are a wiggly worm.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: With your other hand make a worm house by making a circle with your fingers and thumb and place it on the floor.
source_text: With your other hand make a worm house by making a circle with your fingers and thumb and place it on the floor.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Call out an instruction for your finger to touch, like “Worms on noses” or “Worms on ears”
source_text: Call out an instruction for your finger to touch, like “Worms on noses” or “Worms on ears”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: When you call out “Worms go home”, your wiggly worm has to find a worm house as quickly as possible.
source_text: When you call out “Worms go home”, your wiggly worm has to find a worm house as quickly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: The last worm to find a home calls out the instructions next.
source_text: The last worm to find a home calls out the instructions next.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Keep playing until you feel rejuvenated from lying down.
source_text: Keep playing until you feel rejuvenated from lying down.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Dance choreography
source_text: Dance choreography

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Create a dance choreography to your children’s favorite songs.
source_text: Create a dance choreography to your children’s favorite songs.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: First person does a dance move and everyone else copies.
source_text: First person does a dance move and everyone else copies.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Everyone takes turns being the leader.
source_text: Everyone takes turns being the leader.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Perform it for the household!
source_text: Perform it for the household!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Mirror
source_text: Mirror

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: This game can be played in pairs or even as a group.
source_text: This game can be played in pairs or even as a group.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Stand facing each other or in a circle.
source_text: Stand facing each other or in a circle.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: One person leads first while everyone else must copy, trying to move exactly at the same time as the leader.
source_text: One person leads first while everyone else must copy, trying to move exactly at the same time as the leader.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Make sure the leader moves slowly enough for everyone to follow! Explore moving different body parts and in different levels.
source_text: Make sure the leader moves slowly enough for everyone to follow! Explore moving different body parts and in different levels.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: After a while, switch who is leading. Give everyone a chance to lead.
source_text: After a while, switch who is leading. Give everyone a chance to lead.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Try it with no leaders!
source_text: Try it with no leaders!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Freeze dance
source_text: Freeze dance

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Play music or someone sings a song, and everyone dances.
source_text: Play music or someone sings a song, and everyone dances.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: When the music stops, everyone must freeze.
source_text: When the music stops, everyone must freeze.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Last person still dancing becomes the judge for the next round.
source_text: Last person still dancing becomes the judge for the next round.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: A variation to Freeze Dance is Animal Dance: It’s the same as Freeze Dance but when the music stops, one member of the family calls out the name of an animal, and everyone has to become that animal.
source_text: A variation to Freeze Dance is Animal Dance: It’s the same as Freeze Dance but when the music stops, one member of the family calls out the name of an animal, and everyone has to become that animal.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Run Around and Do This
source_text: Run Around and Do This

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Everyone runs around the room or garden.  Make sure the space is large enough and safe.
source_text: Everyone runs around the room or garden.  Make sure the space is large enough and safe.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: At any time, someone can stop somewhere and say, “When you get over here, you do this!”
source_text: At any time, someone can stop somewhere and say, “When you get over here, you do this!”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: What you do can be anything: push-ups, singing a song, crying, jumping…
source_text: What you do can be anything: push-ups, singing a song, crying, jumping…

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: The more you play, the more there are things to do in more and more places.
source_text: The more you play, the more there are things to do in more and more places.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Each person can decide where to go and when.
source_text: Each person can decide where to go and when.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: It’s fun to interact with other people who are doing the same thing as you!
source_text: It’s fun to interact with other people who are doing the same thing as you!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: Stage Directions
source_text: Stage Directions

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: This is the same as Ship to Shore but with Stage Directions. This can be done in an elevated and safe area. The director gives the instructions.
source_text: This is the same as Ship to Shore but with Stage Directions. This can be done in an elevated and safe area. The director gives the instructions.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: “Stage Right” means you go to the right.
source_text: “Stage Right” means you go to the right.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: “Stage Left” means you go to the left.
source_text: “Stage Left” means you go to the left.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: “Downstage” means you go down.
source_text: “Downstage” means you go down.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: “Upstage” means you go up.
source_text: “Upstage” means you go up.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: “Centre Stage” means you go to the centre of the stage.”
source_text: “Centre Stage” means you go to the centre of the stage.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: You can have fun actions like “Dramatic Death, Take a Bow, Open the Curtain, Clean the Floor,” etc.
source_text: You can have fun actions like “Dramatic Death, Take a Bow, Open the Curtain, Clean the Floor,” etc.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: Instead of “Lifeboat” you make “Cast of Actors.” Those not in the cast become the director!
source_text: Instead of “Lifeboat” you make “Cast of Actors.” Those not in the cast become the director!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Blind Kapre
source_text: Blind Kapre

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: This game is great if you have at least 4 people.
source_text: This game is great if you have at least 4 people.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Tell the story about a ferocious Kapre who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive. This continued for many years until the Kapre became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.
source_text: Tell the story about a ferocious Kapre who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive. This continued for many years until the Kapre became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: One person plays the Kapre. The Kapre sits blindfolded or with eyes closed surrounded by a pile of treasure.
source_text: One person plays the Kapre. The Kapre sits blindfolded or with eyes closed surrounded by a pile of treasure.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Everyone has one piece of treasure that they must steal back.
source_text: Everyone has one piece of treasure that they must steal back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: If the Kapre hears you and points at you, you must go back to the starting place.
source_text: If the Kapre hears you and points at you, you must go back to the starting place.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Only one person can try to get the treasure at a time.
source_text: Only one person can try to get the treasure at a time.

source_text: Children love to hear stories about your own life!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - When I was younger

source_text: Think of a time when you were younger when something BIG happened to you.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Everyone takes turns being the leader.
source_text: Everyone takes turns being the leader.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Perform it for the household!
source_text: Perform it for the household!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: What Are You Doing?
source_text: What Are You Doing?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: This game is best when more than 2 people play.
source_text: This game is best when more than 2 people play.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair.
source_text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: A second person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: A second person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”
source_text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: The second person’s answer must always be something different from what they are actually doing!
source_text: The second person’s answer must always be something different from what they are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: The next person should act out the second person’s answer and when someone asks what they are doing, their answer must be different from what they are actually doing!
source_text: The next person should act out the second person’s answer and when someone asks what they are doing, their answer must be different from what they are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Make up a story!
source_text: Make up a story!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”
source_text: Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Let your teen make up the next sentence.
source_text: Let your teen make up the next sentence.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Then you make up a sentence.
source_text: Then you make up a sentence.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Take turns until you have a wonderful new story.
source_text: Take turns until you have a wonderful new story.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Make sure to end the story on a positive note.
source_text: Make sure to end the story on a positive note.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Ask your teen what was their favourite part of the story!
source_text: Ask your teen what was their favourite part of the story!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Crazy Chicken
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8.
source_text: Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it as fast and loud as you can.
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Repeat with your other hand. Then do it for each foot.
source_text: Repeat with your other hand. Then do it for each foot.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” when you’re finished and does their best crazy chicken dance!
source_text: Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” when you’re finished and does their best crazy chicken dance!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Pass the Snap
source_text: Pass the Snap

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: This game is best with at least 3 people.
source_text: This game is best with at least 3 people.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Start in a circle and pass one snap around the circle (or clap if you cannot snap).
source_text: Start in a circle and pass one snap around the circle (or clap if you cannot snap).

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: You snap once to throw the snap.
source_text: You snap once to throw the snap.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: You can bounce the snap, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.
source_text: You can bounce the snap, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: The direction (up, down, straight, curved, rolling the ground) and force (hard, soft, medium) that you throw the snap should affect how the person catches it.
source_text: The direction (up, down, straight, curved, rolling the ground) and force (hard, soft, medium) that you throw the snap should affect how the person catches it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Look at the person you are throwing the snap to.
source_text: Look at the person you are throwing the snap to.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: The person who will catch it has to snap once to catch it.
source_text: The person who will catch it has to snap once to catch it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: When everyone gets good at this, you can start moving around the room, still passing around the snap.
source_text: When everyone gets good at this, you can start moving around the room, still passing around the snap.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Can you throw under the leg?  Behind the back?  Through your head?  Intercept a pass? Have fun with the snap!
source_text: Can you throw under the leg?  Behind the back?  Through your head?  Intercept a pass? Have fun with the snap!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Just a friendly chat
source_text: Just a friendly chat

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Have a conversation with your teen about something they like.
source_text: Have a conversation with your teen about something they like.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: It can be about anything they choose to talk about: sports, friends, music, celebrities…
source_text: It can be about anything they choose to talk about: sports, friends, music, celebrities…

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Try to listen to your teen and give them space to talk.
source_text: Try to listen to your teen and give them space to talk.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: What new thing did you learn about your teen from your chat?
source_text: What new thing did you learn about your teen from your chat?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the End of the Day
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Talk to your teen about one positive or fun thing they did.
source_text: Talk to your teen about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: You are a star!
source_text: You are a star!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie
source_text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.
source_text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, I love ice cream and I really wish I could sing.
source_text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, I love ice cream and I really wish I could sing.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Say them to your partner or friends. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.
source_text: Say them to your partner or friends. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?
source_text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?
source_text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Family Work Out
source_text: Family Work Out

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Choose a sport or exercise to do together
source_text: Choose a sport or exercise to do together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long?
source_text: Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Try it out for a week.
source_text: Try it out for a week.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions. How’s it going? How did you feel at the start of the week? How do you feel at the end of the week? What can we do differently next week?
source_text: At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions. How’s it going? How did you feel at the start of the week? How do you feel at the end of the week? What can we do differently next week?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Crazy Chicken
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Shake your hand in the air 8 times while counting to 8.
source_text: Shake your hand in the air 8 times while counting to 8.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it as fast and loud as you can.
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Repeat with your other hand, then do it with each foot.
source_text: Repeat with your other hand, then do it with each foot.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times until you get to 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Call out “Crazy chicken” as loud as you can when you’re finished!
source_text: Call out “Crazy chicken” as loud as you can when you’re finished!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Have you released all your stress? If not, do it again even faster and louder!
source_text: Have you released all your stress? If not, do it again even faster and louder!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stressed, here's a fun activity that can also release some stress.
source_text: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stressed, here's a fun activity that can also release some stress.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the Sunshine of Positive Attention shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.
source_text: Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the Sunshine of Positive Attention shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from your ankles. Remember to turn your foot to both sides - to the left and then to the right. Do each foot with four circles in each direction.
source_text: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from your ankles. Remember to turn your foot to both sides - to the left and then to the right. Do each foot with four circles in each direction.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!
source_text: Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Let your hand hang by your side. As you breathe in, squeeze your shoulders up to your ears, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you breathe out and relax your body.
source_text: Let your hand hang by your side. As you breathe in, squeeze your shoulders up to your ears, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you breathe out and relax your body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out. Repeat 4 times.
source_text: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out. Repeat 4 times.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Relax your arms and let them swing to the front and back. Take 4 deep breaths while you do this. This is good for your lower back.
source_text: Relax your arms and let them swing to the front and back. Take 4 deep breaths while you do this. This is good for your lower back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Relax your arms and let your arms swing sideways as you turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.
source_text: Relax your arms and let your arms swing sideways as you turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.
source_text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Hello! Did you know that 3 is a magical number? Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three. How do you feel now? Do you feel any different?
source_text: Hello! Did you know that 3 is a magical number? Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three. How do you feel now? Do you feel any different?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: What are your three favourite foods? Can you name three things you can see right now? Can you hear three sounds you can hear right now? What are three things you are grateful for right now?
source_text: What are your three favourite foods? Can you name three things you can see right now? Can you hear three sounds you can hear right now? What are three things you are grateful for right now?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three? How do you feel now? Do you feel any different? Three is a magical number!
source_text: Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three? How do you feel now? Do you feel any different? Three is a magical number!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: Stop & Listen
source_text: Stop & Listen

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Stop for a moment and close your eyes.
source_text: • Stop for a moment and close your eyes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • How many sounds can you hear? Listen to sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. (Pause for 10 seconds)
source_text: • How many sounds can you hear? Listen to sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. (Pause for 10 seconds)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • How many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?
source_text: • How many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Let’s try again. Can you hear any new sounds this time? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body? (Pause for 10 seconds)
source_text: • Let’s try again. Can you hear any new sounds this time? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body? (Pause for 10 seconds)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Open your eyes. What new sounds did you hear?
source_text: • Open your eyes. What new sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Release Some Energy
source_text: Release Some Energy

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Pause Power!
source_text: Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Pause Power!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: What’s Pause Power I hear you say? It’s the ability to transform from a grumpy, angry person into a calm, clear one.
source_text: What’s Pause Power I hear you say? It’s the ability to transform from a grumpy, angry person into a calm, clear one.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: When I’m feeling frustrated I plant my feet firmly on the ground and I breathe in and out three times as slowly as I can. Sometimes I imagine I’m smelling a flower and blowing out a candle.
source_text: When I’m feeling frustrated I plant my feet firmly on the ground and I breathe in and out three times as slowly as I can. Sometimes I imagine I’m smelling a flower and blowing out a candle.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Ta-da!!!! Pause Power! My transformation from grumpy to calm is complete!
source_text: Ta-da!!!! Pause Power! My transformation from grumpy to calm is complete!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Give Yourself A Hug
source_text: Give Yourself A Hug

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Bella mama, bella mama hey.
source_text: Bella mama, bella mama hey.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Hey there! How are you feeling today? Do you feel great?!
source_text: Hey there! How are you feeling today? Do you feel great?!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Maybe not. Maybe you shouted again at your children today? Maybe you got angry and said something you don't feel proud of? It’s ok. It’s super stressful right now.
source_text: Maybe not. Maybe you shouted again at your children today? Maybe you got angry and said something you don't feel proud of? It’s ok. It’s super stressful right now.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Take a deep breath and think of one thing you did today that you do feel proud of. It doesn't have to be big. And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug. And now think of one thing you did today that you don't feel proud of. What can you do differently tomorrow? And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug.
source_text: Take a deep breath and think of one thing you did today that you do feel proud of. It doesn't have to be big. And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug. And now think of one thing you did today that you don't feel proud of. What can you do differently tomorrow? And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama hey”.
source_text: Bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama hey”.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Taking care of yourself
source_text: Taking care of yourself

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.
source_text: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?
source_text: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest.
source_text: Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself

source_text: May I feel loved.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need extra support.
source_text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need extra support.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Crazy Chicken
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8
source_text: Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it as fast and loud as you can
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Repeat with your other hand. Repeat with each foot.
source_text: Repeat with your other hand. Repeat with each foot.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” and does their best crazy chicken dance!
source_text: Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” and does their best crazy chicken dance!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Drawing
source_text: Drawing

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Children love to draw! It helps build creativity.
source_text: Children love to draw! It helps build creativity.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Get some pens or crayons and a piece of paper or cardboard.
source_text: Get some pens or crayons and a piece of paper or cardboard.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Let your children freely draw whatever they want.
source_text: Let your children freely draw whatever they want.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: While your child is drawing, use words to describe what they are doing: “I see you are drawing a person” or “I see you are making lines with the red crayon.”
source_text: While your child is drawing, use words to describe what they are doing: “I see you are drawing a person” or “I see you are making lines with the red crayon.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: You can also have fun drawing next to them.
source_text: You can also have fun drawing next to them.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Put their drawings up on the wall, refrigerator, or outside to decorate the house – it will make your children feel appreciated!
source_text: Put their drawings up on the wall, refrigerator, or outside to decorate the house – it will make your children feel appreciated!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Self-portrait
source_text: Self-portrait

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Here’s how your children can draw a picture of themselves!
source_text: Here’s how your children can draw a picture of themselves!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Find a big piece of paper or cardboard. It needs to be the same length or slightly longer than the height of your child.
source_text: Find a big piece of paper or cardboard. It needs to be the same length or slightly longer than the height of your child.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Ask your child to lie down on the paper. Carefully draw the outline of your child.
source_text: Ask your child to lie down on the paper. Carefully draw the outline of your child.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Now let your child fill in the outline: face, hair, clothes, shoes, or anything they want!
source_text: Now let your child fill in the outline: face, hair, clothes, shoes, or anything they want!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Ask your child to draw things that they like and do not like outside of the outline.
source_text: Ask your child to draw things that they like and do not like outside of the outline.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Have a conversation with your child about these things. You may learn something about your child!
source_text: Have a conversation with your child about these things. You may learn something about your child!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: You can put their outline up in their room or anywhere in the house – it will make your children feel appreciated!
source_text: You can put their outline up in their room or anywhere in the house – it will make your children feel appreciated!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Transform the object
source_text: Transform the object

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Everyday household items like brooms, mops, or scarfs can become fun props for games.
source_text: Everyday household items like brooms, mops, or scarfs can become fun props for games.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Place an object in the center of the room and whenever someone has an idea, they jump in and show the rest what the object can be.
source_text: Place an object in the center of the room and whenever someone has an idea, they jump in and show the rest what the object can be.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: For example, a broom might be ridden as a horse or a microphone or a guitar!
source_text: For example, a broom might be ridden as a horse or a microphone or a guitar!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: Name that tune
source_text: Name that tune

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: First person gets to choose or sing a song.
source_text: First person gets to choose or sing a song.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: Everyone else must guess the name of the tune (to make it harder they can guess the singer).
source_text: Everyone else must guess the name of the tune (to make it harder they can guess the singer).

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: The first one to guess it right becomes the next leader who will choose or sing the next song.
source_text: The first one to guess it right becomes the next leader who will choose or sing the next song.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Memory game – “When COVID-19 ends…”
source_text: Memory game – “When COVID-19 ends…”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: First person says, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to… (e.g., go to the park)”
source_text: First person says, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to… (e.g., go to the park)”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Second person adds to the first person’s plan, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to the park and… (e.g., visit my best friend)”
source_text: Second person adds to the first person’s plan, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to the park and… (e.g., visit my best friend)”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Each person adds to the previous list of plans, trying to think of all of the fun things to do when COVID-19 ends.
source_text: Each person adds to the previous list of plans, trying to think of all of the fun things to do when COVID-19 ends.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: Ship to Shore
source_text: Ship to Shore

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: A fun active game where children learn different parts of a boat. Everyone must go to the place or activity that you call out.
source_text: A fun active game where children learn different parts of a boat. Everyone must go to the place or activity that you call out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Bow” means run to the front of the boat (room).
source_text: “Bow” means run to the front of the boat (room).

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Stern” means run to the back of the boat.
source_text: “Stern” means run to the back of the boat.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Starboard” means run to the right side and “Port” means run to the left side.
source_text: “Starboard” means run to the right side and “Port” means run to the left side.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Climb the rigging”: pretend to climb.
source_text: “Climb the rigging”: pretend to climb.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Clean the deck”: pretend to clean the floor.
source_text: “Clean the deck”: pretend to clean the floor.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Lifeboat, [number] people!”: hold hands in a circle with that many people and do knee bends.
source_text: “Lifeboat, [number] people!”: hold hands in a circle with that many people and do knee bends.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: Everyone not in a lifeboat must swim!
source_text: Everyone not in a lifeboat must swim!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie
source_text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.
source_text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, experiences at school, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, my favourite subject is science, and I really wish I could sing.
source_text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, experiences at school, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, my favourite subject is science, and I really wish I could sing.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Say them to your teenager. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.
source_text: Say them to your teenager. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?
source_text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?
source_text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Three options
source_text: Three options

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Think of three different situations. For example, driving a car, sailing a boat, or flying a plane.
source_text: Think of three different situations. For example, driving a car, sailing a boat, or flying a plane.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Say them to your teen and ask, “Which would you prefer?”
source_text: Say them to your teen and ask, “Which would you prefer?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Ask them why?
source_text: Ask them why?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Now think of three more situations or ask your teen to do it for you.
source_text: Now think of three more situations or ask your teen to do it for you.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Yes, No, or Maybe
source_text: Yes, No, or Maybe

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Ask each other questions. They can be any questions about things you like or what you did today.
source_text: Ask each other questions. They can be any questions about things you like or what you did today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: The only rule is that you can’t answer Yes, No, or Maybe.
source_text: The only rule is that you can’t answer Yes, No, or Maybe.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: How long can you last? How creative can you get with your answers?
source_text: How long can you last? How creative can you get with your answers?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Swap over and play again!
source_text: Swap over and play again!

source_text: The Interrupter

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter

source_text: Choose a storyteller to start making up a story.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter

source_text: Story listeners can interrupt with a word at any time.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter

source_text: The storyteller needs to fit that word in their story.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter

source_text: Ask each other, “What made you happy today?”

source_text: Ask each other, “What was difficult today?”

text: • Cover your face with your hands.
source_text: • Cover your face with your hands.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: • Quickly show your face and say "Peek-a-Boo!" or "Hello!"

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Funny Faces
source_text: Funny Faces

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Look at your baby in the eyes and make different funny faces.
source_text: Look at your baby in the eyes and make different funny faces.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Make a big face. Make a small face. Make a happy face. Make a surprised face.
source_text: Make a big face. Make a small face. Make a happy face. Make a surprised face.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Which ones make your baby smile or laugh? Do them again, even bigger this time!
source_text: Which ones make your baby smile or laugh? Do them again, even bigger this time!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Play with different feelings and add sounds.
source_text: Play with different feelings and add sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Copy their facial expressions too. Exaggerate them to make them funny.
source_text: Copy their facial expressions too. Exaggerate them to make them funny.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Always end on a positive expression!
source_text: Always end on a positive expression!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: Mirror Game
source_text: Mirror Game

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Get to your baby's level so they can see you and hear you.
source_text: • Get to your baby's level so they can see you and hear you.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Copy their facial expressions and sounds.
source_text: • Copy their facial expressions and sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • It is simple and helps create a strong bond between you and your baby!
source_text: • It is simple and helps create a strong bond between you and your baby!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: The Sun is Coming!
source_text: The Sun is Coming!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Lie your baby on their back after washing them or changing their diaper.
source_text: Lie your baby on their back after washing them or changing their diaper.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the sun is coming! Wiggle your fingers like sun rays above their head and make your face a big smiling sun.
source_text: Tell them the sun is coming! Wiggle your fingers like sun rays above their head and make your face a big smiling sun.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the wind is coming! Blow softly over their body.
source_text: Tell them the wind is coming! Blow softly over their body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the rain is coming! Use your fingers to gently pat over their whole body like light raindrops.
source_text: Tell them the rain is coming! Use your fingers to gently pat over their whole body like light raindrops.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the clouds are coming! Wrap the towel or cloth around them like a blanket and cuddle them.
source_text: Tell them the clouds are coming! Wrap the towel or cloth around them like a blanket and cuddle them.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Play with different weathers. Which one does your baby like best?
source_text: Play with different weathers. Which one does your baby like best?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Add sound effects or make it into a little song. Use the tune of another song you know!
source_text: Add sound effects or make it into a little song. Use the tune of another song you know!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Shakers
source_text: Shakers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Find an empty, clean plastic bottle or pot with a lid that closes tight.
source_text: Find an empty, clean plastic bottle or pot with a lid that closes tight.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Fill it with sand, stones, beans or any small objects that make an interesting sound.
source_text: Fill it with sand, stones, beans or any small objects that make an interesting sound.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Move your body as you shake it in front of your baby.
source_text: Move your body as you shake it in front of your baby.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: If it is safe, give it to your baby to shake!
source_text: If it is safe, give it to your baby to shake!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Get creative! Can you find something colourful, or try it with water?
source_text: Get creative! Can you find something colourful, or try it with water?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: What sounds does your baby like?
source_text: What sounds does your baby like?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Musical Toes
source_text: Musical Toes

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Put your baby on their back.
source_text: Put your baby on their back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Wiggle their toe and say, “This little toe goes [funny sound].”
source_text: Wiggle their toe and say, “This little toe goes [funny sound].”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Make a funny sound for each toe.
source_text: Make a funny sound for each toe.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Play with different sounds. For example, animal sounds, popping sounds, squeaky sounds, fart sounds.
source_text: Play with different sounds. For example, animal sounds, popping sounds, squeaky sounds, fart sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Repeat this for all ten toes.
source_text: Repeat this for all ten toes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Try to make the last toe the biggest and funniest sound!
source_text: Try to make the last toe the biggest and funniest sound!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Down in a ditch!
source_text: Down in a ditch!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Sit on a chair and put your toddler on your lap facing you. Hold them firmly under the arms.
source_text: Sit on a chair and put your toddler on your lap facing you. Hold them firmly under the arms.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Gently bounce your legs and say in a soft voice “Baby horse, baby horse, baby horse, baby horse”
source_text: Gently bounce your legs and say in a soft voice “Baby horse, baby horse, baby horse, baby horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Bounce your legs a bit more and say a bit louder “Little horse, little horse, little horse, little horse”
source_text: Bounce your legs a bit more and say a bit louder “Little horse, little horse, little horse, little horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Bounce your legs more and say louder “Big horse, big horse, big horse, big horse”
source_text: Bounce your legs more and say louder “Big horse, big horse, big horse, big horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: When you call out “Down in a ditch!” open your knees and let your child drop down between them. Make sure you hold them so they don’t fall far!
source_text: When you call out “Down in a ditch!” open your knees and let your child drop down between them. Make sure you hold them so they don’t fall far!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Dance Party
source_text: Dance Party

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Put on your favourite music or sing your favourite song and dance around the room with your toddler. If you have a baby hold them while you dance.
source_text: Put on your favourite music or sing your favourite song and dance around the room with your toddler. If you have a baby hold them while you dance.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Dance in different ways or with different parts of your body.
source_text: Dance in different ways or with different parts of your body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: For example, “Dance like a monkey”, “Dance like a chicken” or “Let’s dance with our knees and hips.”
source_text: For example, “Dance like a monkey”, “Dance like a chicken” or “Let’s dance with our knees and hips.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Think up different instructions. Be seriously playful!
source_text: Think up different instructions. Be seriously playful!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: When the music stops, everyone does a funny freeze.
source_text: When the music stops, everyone does a funny freeze.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Notice what rhythms or movements they like!
source_text: Notice what rhythms or movements they like!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Lullaby
source_text: Lullaby

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: When your baby or toddler cries, sing a soft song to calm you both down.
source_text: When your baby or toddler cries, sing a soft song to calm you both down.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Sing a soothing song you know or make up your own with a simple melody and some soothing words.
source_text: Sing a soothing song you know or make up your own with a simple melody and some soothing words.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Repeat it over and over in a rhythmical way. For example, “My little one, oh little one.”
source_text: Repeat it over and over in a rhythmical way. For example, “My little one, oh little one.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Sing the same song regularly so your child gets used to it!
source_text: Sing the same song regularly so your child gets used to it!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: See It Be It
source_text: See It Be It

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup.
source_text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it.”
source_text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.
source_text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?
source_text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.
source_text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!
source_text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Cooking together
source_text: Cooking together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Children love to do what you do!
source_text: Children love to do what you do!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Let your baby play with pots and spoons while you are making dinner.
source_text: Let your baby play with pots and spoons while you are making dinner.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the End of the Day
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Talk to your child about one positive or fun thing they did.
source_text: Talk to your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: You are a star!
source_text: You are a star!

source_text: Rain on the Mountain

text: Call out, “There’s rain on the mountain.”
source_text: Call out, “There’s rain on the mountain.”

source_text: Everyone else replies “Run, run, run” while running around the space.

source_text: Call out different instructions. For example, touch something red or hop like a frog.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Listening to Sounds
source_text: Listening to Sounds

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Sit down and close your eyes.
source_text: Sit down and close your eyes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: How many sounds can you hear? Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers.
source_text: How many sounds can you hear? Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: After ten seconds, how many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?
source_text: After ten seconds, how many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Try again for another ten seconds.
source_text: Try again for another ten seconds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Can you hear any new sounds? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body?
source_text: Can you hear any new sounds? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Notice how you feel and ask your child how they are feeling.
source_text: Notice how you feel and ask your child how they are feeling.
